game.name: Two Worlds II - Shattered Embrace
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Return to Antaloor for a brand new adventure in the Two Worlds saga! When the ancient Elves resurface on a remote island, an old secret leads to the rise of a new evil. Racing against time, you must travel to the depths of hell and back before secrets of the past destroy the future of the land!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Return to Antaloor for a brand new adventure in the Two Worlds saga! When the ancient Elves resurface on a remote island, an old secret leads to the rise of a new evil. Racing against time, you must travel to the depths of hell and back before secrets of the past destroy the future of the land!
